name: FortiGate Syslog pipeline
summary: Converts FortiGate Syslog fields to the correct data type and removes unnecessary fields
description:
# graylog-fortigate-syslog-pipeline

## FortiGate syslog data cleanup

Converts FortiGate syslog fields to the correct data type and removes unnecessary fields.

### Dependencies

- [FortiGate syslog content pack](https://github.com/seanthegeek/graylog-fortigate-syslog) provides the required `Graylog Syslog` stream

description.@value: Converts FortiGate syslog fields to the correct data type and removes unnecessary fields

source.@value:
pipeline "FortiGate Syslog data cleanup"
stage 0 match either
rule "appid to long"
rule "attackid to long"
rule "cat to long"
rule "craction to long"
rule "crscore to long"
rule "destip to ip"
rule "destport to long"
rule "dstip to ip"
rule "duration to long"
rule "durationdelta to long"
rule "eventtime to long"
rule "facility_num to long"
rule "incidentserialno to long"
rule "lanin to long"
rule "lanout to long"
rule "level to long"
rule "logid to long"
rule "policyid to long"
rule "proto to long"
rule "qtypeval to long"
rule "rcvdbyte to long"
rule "rcvddelta to long"
rule "rcvdpkt to long"
rule "rcvdpktdelta to long"
rule "sentbyte to long"
rule "sentdelta to long"
rule "sentpkt to long"
rule "sentpktdelta to long"
rule "sessionid to long"
rule "srcip to ip"
rule "srcport to long"
rule "transip to ip"
rule "transport to long"
rule "wanin to long"
rule "wanout to long"
rule "xid to long"
stage 1 match either
rule "remove date field"
rule "remove destuuid field"
rule "remove eventtime field"
rule "remove facility field"
rule "remove facility_num field"
rule "remove logid field"
rule "remove poluuid field"
rule "remove srcuuid field"
rule "remove time field"
rule "remove tz field"
rule "remove unused start action fields"
end

rule "remove logid field"
when
  has_field(
    field : "logid"
  )
then
  remove_field(
    field : "logid",
    invert : false
  );
end

rule "sentdelta to long"
when
  has_field("sentdelta")
then
  set_field("sentdelta", to_long($message.sentdelta));
end

rule "xid to long"
when
  has_field("xid")
then
  set_field("xid", to_long($message.xid));
end

rule "rcvdbyte to long"
when
  has_field("rcvdbyte")
then
  set_field("rcvdbyte", to_long($message.rcvdbyte));
end

rule "remove facility_num field"
when
  has_field(
    field : "facility_num"
  )
then
  remove_field(
    field : "facility_num",
    invert : false
  );
end

rule "sentpktdelta to long"
when
  has_field("sentpktdelta")
then
  set_field("sentpktdelta", to_long($message.sentpktdelta));
end

rule "craction to long"
when
  has_field("craction")
then
  set_field("craction", to_long($message.craction));
end

rule "remove time field"
when
  has_field(
    field : "time"
  )
then
  remove_field(
    field : "time",
    invert : false
  );
end

rule "sentpkt to long"
when
  has_field("sentpkt")
then
  set_field("sentpkt", to_long($message.sentpkt));
end

rule "sessionid to long"

then
  set_field("sessionid", to_long($message.sessionid));
end

rule "destip to ip"

end

rule "rcvdpktdelta to long"

end

rule "transport to long"
